text: Bernard L. "Bernie" Lieder (February 19, 1923 – August 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Minnesota House of Representatives between 1985 and 2011. He was a member of the Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party. Lieder died on August 22, 2020 in Crookston, Minnesota at the age of 97.Lieder, Bernard L. title: Bernard Lieder
